Pre-Game Insights: Stats Insider's model gives the Blue Jays a 66% chance of defeating the Marlins at Rogers Centre.

Betting on the Marlins to win is our preferred option due to the 1.5% edge identified when comparing our data-led probabilities to the odds currently available.
